title: WAF Rule Groups
description: A group of web application firewall rules that share common functionality and traits

links.title: List Rule Groups
links.description: Search, list, and sort rule groups contained within a package

name.description: Name of the firewall rule group

mode.description: Whether or not the rules contained within this group are configurable/usable

rules_count.description: How many rules are contained within this group

match.description: Whether to match all search requirements or at least one (any)

links.title: Rule Group Details

    "mode": "on",

}

name.description: Name of the firewall rule group

description.example: "Group designed to protect against IP addresses that are a threat and typically used to launch DDoS attacks"
description.description: Summary of what the WAF Rule Set does

rules_count.description: How many rules are contained within this group

modified_rules_count.description: How many rules have been modified from their default within the group

mode.description: Whether or not the rules contained within this group are configurable/usable

allowed_modes.description: The available states the group can have. This will affect the state of rules within this group.

items.description: Whether or not the rules contained within this group are configurable/usable
